message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable asset. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product, I can assure you it's worth at least $1000000 to me.  I'm willing to sell it to you for $1250000. This is a significant discount considering its potential value.  If you're interested, let me know and we can discuss the details further.  If not, I have another buyer lined up.
